      • setHeading

        public boolean setHeading(double heading)
        Sets the absolute heading. Heading will be +/- 1 from the given heading.
        Parameters:
        heading - the new heading for the robot.
        Returns:
        true when the heading is reached.

      • setHeading

        public boolean setHeading(double heading,
                          double precision)
        Sets the absolute heading.
        Parameters:
        heading - is the new heading for the robot.
        precision - sets the threshold for how much the heading is allowed to differ.
        Returns:
        true when the heading is reached.

      • showStats

        public void showStats()

      • turnForWall

        public boolean turnForWall(double perimiter)
        Method for avoiding walls.
        Parameters:
        perimiter - decides at which distance the robot should start turning for walls it is approaching.
        Returns:
        true if the robot had to make a turn to avoid a wall, else false.
